name: in my Dream
description:
As a content of the game there is no clear purpose, just walk.
In the future, I will add various systems, and in the end I am going to play games that are always on and feel free to change my mood.
As a schedule, reduction of processing, improvement of graphics. Add animals, insects, birds.
Basically, we do not implement skills, levels, battle concepts.
Sorry about Google translation.
